speedMultiplier.description: The speed multiplier which will be applied to all levels on this difficulty.

scoreMultiplier.description: The score multiplier which will be applied to all Score Events on this difficulty. Certain Score Events can ignore this multiplier by setting their ignoreDifficultyMultiplier field to true.
scoreMultiplier.markdownDescription: The score multiplier which will be applied to all Score Events on this difficulty. Certain Score Events can ignore this multiplier by setting their `ignoreDifficultyMultiplier` field to `true`.

lifeConfig.description: Defines the way lives should behave.

type.description: The type of the life system.
Lives will be earned every set amount of points.

startingLives.description: How many lives the player will start the game with.

scorePerLife.description: Every how many points an extra life should be granted.

countUnmultipliedScore.description: Whether the score counted for the next life will be unaffected by the difficulty multiplier. Defaults to false.
countUnmultipliedScore.markdownDescription: Whether the score counted for the next life will be unaffected by the difficulty multiplier. Defaults to `false`.

rollbackScoreAfterFailure.description: Whether the score will be reverted to the previous value when the level is lost. Defaults to false.
rollbackScoreAfterFailure.markdownDescription: Whether the score will be reverted to the previous value when the level is lost. Defaults to `false`.
